definition: to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: To travels frequently in China and also abroad, on trips to meet donors.
sentences.chinese: 杜聪在中国和国外频繁穿梭旅行，会见捐赠者。

sentences.english: Many agencies try to motivate donors with the mathematics of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 许多机构试图用简单的算术例子来激励捐赠者。

sentences.english: Out of pressing need, the mother complies but the donator disappeared without forking up.
sentences.chinese: 迫于所需的母亲照办了，但是捐赠者却食言消失了。

sentences.english: He was inseminated using sperm from an anonymous donor.
sentences.chinese: 他是通过匿名精子捐赠者受精。

sentences.english: It makes sense. If this is metallic, it is a good electron donor.
sentences.chinese: 这有意义了，如果这是金属，它就是也好的捐赠者。

sentences.english: In these cases, the recipient usually takes care of the donor afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 在这类情况下，接受捐献者以后通常会照顾捐赠者。

sentences.english: Cancilla says she is unable even to speculate who the donor could be.
sentences.chinese: 坎希拉说，她根本无法猜到捐赠者可能是谁。

sentences.english: Well there are also sometimes ads in the Harvard Crimson and the other college newspapers for sperm donors.
sentences.chinese: 在哈佛校报上和其他院校登过找精子捐赠者的广告。

sentences.english: The Occupiers offer free food, also provided by donors.
sentences.chinese: 占领者们提供的免费食品也是捐赠者给的。

sentences.english: And you have no organ donors.
She burst into tears as she knew her son got a heart donor.
sentences.chinese: 当她得知有心脏捐赠者捐心给儿子时，立刻泪如雨下。

sentences.english: Germany is the third biggest contributor to the UN-backed fund.
sentences.chinese: 德国是该联合国支持的基金的第三大捐赠者。

sentences.english: Millions of devotees shave their heads each year and it is sold at auctions.
sentences.chinese: 数百万捐赠者每年剃发，头发将被拍卖。

sentences.english: Six months out or one year later, check in and thank your donors profusely.
sentences.chinese: 半年或者一年过后，登记并且感谢你的捐赠者的慷慨。

sentences.english: The most is, with living donors.
sentences.chinese: 最难忘的是活体器官捐赠者。

definition: blood generating stem cells (in bone marrow)
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to check for compatibility (for an organ transplant)
